title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.1 - Records available for inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.1 - Records available for inspection and copying

State Regulations
A current list by subject matter of records available to the
public for inspection and copying, is being maintained at the office of the
commission. [FN*] The offices of the commission are located at 880 Third

Avenue, New York, New York 10022, telephone 212-759-3342. [FN*] Public Officers Law, ยง88(4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6700.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
